sections.title: Natural Alchemist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Natural Alchemist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Natural alchemists gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond what they already possess.

sections.title: Extracts or Spells per Day (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Natural alchemist levels advance extract or spell progression from a previous alchemist or arcane spellcasting class, but do not grant other class features.

sections.title: Healing Solution (Su) (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Converts two extracts or spells into curative extracts as a full-round action, starting with cure light wounds and progressing to more powerful healing spells.

sections.title: Natural Discovery (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Grants access to specific alchemist discoveries focused on healing, potions, and preservation effects at 2nd, 4th, 6th, and 8th levels.

sections.title: Shared Infusion (Su) (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Allows infusion extracts of multi-target spells to affect multiple creatures equal to Intelligence bonus when consumed within 1 round.

sections.title: Bombs (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Increases bomb damage by 1d6 and grants additional bombs per day every 3 levels, or grants bomb ability to non-alchemists.

sections.title: Curative Enhancement (Su) (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Allows healing solutions to remove various conditions by reducing healing potency, with more conditions available at higher levels.

sections.title: Eternal Youth (Su) (Natural Alchemist)
sections.description: Grants the ability to create an imperfect duplicate of the sun orchid elixir that functions as the eternal youth grand discovery.
